channel.title: Quest to 99 Fletching
channel.description:
[b]CAN NOT UPDATE PICTURES FOR NOW, Sorry. Will update when i get back to my laptop.[/b]
Hello, as you may have quest from the Title, I am working towards 99 fletching. And I also have a permanent mute, slowing me down some when i am trying to buy/sell stuff.
[b]Current Level:[/b] 80
[b]Currently:[/b] Making Yew longs until 85 for Mage longs.
[b]Progress:[/b] [IMG]http://goal.leetscape.com/sig/fletching/99/mage4life919.png[/img]
[b]Pictures:[/b] [Will Post more when i get them. Kind of slow right now.] [IMG]http://img481.imageshack.us/img481/2565/screenshotrunescapethemok9.png[/img] (I know my other stats suck..so don't even say anything)

Gl with fletching. That make x thing should help out if your lazy, lol.

item.title: Quest to 99 Fletching
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

[quote=“Mort, post:1, topic:123154”]GoodLuck Friend.
Hope you can complete your quest before your brain poofs and you have spent 300$ on new mouses…[/quote]
lol…there is a make “X” and a make “all” now, so it wont be that hard on my laptop…

and sorry about not posting pics, I’m at my dad’s and i can’t.

Read full topic

item.description:

mage_owner:

Its hard, when i have to take 30 minute turns with my little brother and sister, and it takes forever.

I have nothing to say to that because I have 3 pc’s.

item.title: Quest to 99 Fletching
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Good luck man, it’s not that hard. I think I’m somewhere up there, I sorta gave up. Another thing I noticed is that your stats are basically the same as mine… it’s sorta creepy. Except mine are higher.

EDIT: Yea mine’s 85. I think I took a break from fletching one day and never came back.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest to 99 Fletching
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I haven’t tested the new bow strining method myself, but i am pretty sure i would prefer the old one.

I wish you could choose, i mean if i were chatting on msn talking to my gf i would like the new method, but if im only on rs stringing bows i would want the old version.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest to 99 Fletching
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

I haven’t decided if i like it fully or not. It is slower, but it keeps your hand from falling asleep after 200 bows. and it is hard…especially since im hardly on for a week or two.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Good luck, it sounds as if 99 fletching has got a tad harder since they changed the way you string bows.
